column3: Latest;A Kandal police officer who is ------accused of shooting dead his brother-in-law ------has been arrested on the evening on April 22 in a forest in Thalavat district
column4: bordering Stung Treng and Preah Vihear provinces.------The suspect
column5: a police officer from Bakheng police station
column6: escaped after the incident on April 15
column8: which killed his brother-in-law in Koh Okna
